tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
**** ****** ********* Dr Raju is very very experienced n very friendly...... I remember in my high risk pregnancy, 3 years ago, how comfortable he made me feel n assured a healthy baby .... I had a premature delivery, 8th month but thanks to Dr, my baby was fit n fine... 
I was d one with most childish questions n how well  he explained me every bit of it, dat I was Neva scared of my condition.... always available wen called... 
honestly, he is just like a father figure... superb doctor, highly experienced, amazing vibes, amazing aura, always available.... wonderful human being.... I guess we all look for  dese in a Doctor... 
Proud to be your patient... 
glad I met u ðŸ¤—

God bless you and your family

tags: None
review: AVOID GOING TO THIS DOC BY ALL MEANS. the doc is completely commercial in his thought process. will try and scare you to make money out of fear at such a delicate moment. he tried scaring us and asked us to get admitted due to a very small issue and used inappropriate language like miscarriage, abortion constantly so that he can scare us and make money we took a conscious call at that time and decided to walk out of his clinic that moment and visited a much reliable doc who said there is nothing to worry gave us meds and asked my wife to just rest.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I have been going to Dr Raju Shahetya for the past 13 years now.Dr has been like a father figure and God to me ,I have never seen a Dr so professional and so kind ...he makes sure that every query you have has been answered and you don't leave the clinic without your doubts been cleared.I have been cured of my PCOS and had the most blissful pregnancy and delivery thru Dr Raju and his son ankesh shahetya.**** *** **** ** *** *** **** *

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr. Raju is very professional and at the same time very friendly. He makes us very comfortable and does not feel like you are having any issues. I had a complicated case for which i had visited another gynac but the problem could not be solved. 
He examined me thoroughly and gave me proper treatment which enabled me to solve my problem.
Am very thankful to the Doctor and highly recommend him for treatment.
